author: hftsoi
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #36259 (merged to 12_3_X) to 12_2_X. We need this for coming MWGR where online DQM will be using 12_2_1.

title: [backport of #36259] Calo-L1 unpacker modified to read 5BX payload format
